LanguageData.ATR_ChronicAnnoyance.stages.0.label: defective part
LanguageData.ATR_ChronicAnnoyance.stages.0.descriptio: One of my parts is suffering from an extended inefficiency. How inconvenient.
LanguageData.ATR_ChronicAnnoyance.stages.1.label: two defective parts
LanguageData.ATR_ChronicAnnoyance.stages.1.descriptio: Two of my parts are suffering from extended inefficiencies. How annoying.
LanguageData.ATR_ChronicAnnoyance.stages.2.label: three defective parts
LanguageData.ATR_ChronicAnnoyance.stages.2.descriptio: Three of my parts are suffering from extended inefficiencies. This is absurd.
LanguageData.ATR_ChronicAnnoyance.stages.3.label: many defective parts
LanguageData.ATR_ChronicAnnoyance.stages.3.descriptio: A vast number of my parts are dysfunctional! This is ridiculous - I need repairs!
LanguageData.ATR_RustedPart.stages.0.label: rusted part
LanguageData.ATR_RustedPart.stages.0.description: There is rust on my chassis. This is humiliating and denigrating.
